channel.title: CVE Feed for DENX Software Engineering -- U-Boot
channel.description: The latest CVEs for DENX Software Engineering -- U-Boot

item.title: CVE-2022-33967|2024-08-03T08:16:16.135Z -- denx%20software%20engineering -- u-boot
item.description: squashfs filesystem implementation of U-Boot versions from v2020.10-rc2 to v2022.07-rc5 contains a heap-based buffer overflow vulnerability due to a defect in the metadata reading process. Loading a specially crafted squashfs image may lead to a denial-of-service (DoS) condition or arbitrary code execution.
